definition: percussion instrument used by street peddlers, barbers etc to attract attention
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The barber was tinkling the metal to canvass for business.
sentences.chinese: 理髮師在衚衕中敲着喚頭招攬生意。
